title: is it possible to climb ladder as full time support?
body:
Is it possible?

I am having a hard time climbing out of silver 5 as a support, support is my main and i basically do not play any other roles so all my experience in lol is from supporting,

Do i have to rely on my team or adc so much to climb the ladder?

ive tried many supports, i have tried passive healing supports but adc usually still dies from out of position or jungle ganks and i tried aggressive poke supports but adc does not follow through when enemy team hp is low or is stunned from my attacks
